item.title: pgcli
item.description: ov can be set as a pager for pgcli. ~/.config/pgcli/config pager = 'ov -C -d "|" --skip-lines 1 -H1'In pgcli, you can display multiple results. In such cases, it is convenient to use section headers instead of fixed header lines. By setting table_format to psql_unicode, a frame is displayed in Unicode, allowing you to specify the separation of query results. You set the section header by specifying the start of that frame.
